application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings/areas, namely, bedrooms/ studio bedspace below/above/adjoining kitchen/living/dining/bathroom of separate flat and of at least 10dB enhancement for bedrooms adjoining the communal main entrances, pathway and staircase in pursuant to condition 12 of planning permission 232955FUL dated 02/04/2024 for: Construction of a two storey building, with habitable loft space and basement level, to accommodate 7 self-contained flats and provision of associated amenity space, cycle storage and refuse storage. (Following demolition of existing building)
